trans-unit.source: In accessibility scenarios, represents a header cell in the rendered table of a tabular ASP.NET data-bound control, such as <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 접근성 시나리오에서 테이블 형식 ASP.NET 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤의 렌더링된 된 테이블의 머리글 셀을와 같은 나타냅니다 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataControlFieldHeaderCell class is used by data tables (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) to represent accessible headers.
trans-unit.target: DataControlFieldHeaderCell 클래스 데이터 테이블에서 사용 됩니다 (같은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>제어)를 액세스할 수 있는 헤더를 나타내는.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Tabular controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> are considered layout tables, and therefore do not require accessible headers and do not use the DataControlFieldHeaderCell class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>레이아웃 표 것으로 간주 하 고 액세스 가능한 머리글 필요 하지 않습니다, DataControlFieldHeaderCell 클래스를 사용 하지 않는 등과</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> 같은 테이블 형식 컨트롤

trans-unit.source: The DataControlFieldHeaderCell class is used in two cases: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: DataControlFieldHeaderCell 클래스는 두 가지 경우에 사용 됩니다.- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>속성은 `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The field is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> property is set as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -이 필드는 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>개체 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A>속성이로 설정 되어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowHeaderColumn%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField.DataField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: If neither is the case, a regular DataControlFieldHeaderCell object is used, which renders a `<td>` instead of a `<th>` element.
trans-unit.target: 렌더링 하는 일반 DataControlFieldHeaderCell 개체를 사용 하는 경우 둘 다는 `<td>` 대신는 `<th>` 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the DataControlFieldHeaderCell class supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> property, it is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control whenever the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: DataControlFieldHeaderCell 클래스를 지원 하기 때문에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A>속성에서 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>때마다 제어는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A>속성은 `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.UseAccessibleHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> object as the cell's container.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell"> </xref> 클래스를 지정 된 설정 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> 개체 셀의 컨테이너로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DataControlFieldHeaderCell constructor passes the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName> element as its `tagKey` parameter, which is the representation of the HTML tag it is rendered with.
trans-unit.target: DataControlFieldHeaderCell 생성자 패스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName>요소도 해당 `tagKey` 매개 변수를 사용 하 여 렌더링 되는 HTML 태그의 표현입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> passed in the `containingField` parameter is used to determine whether to show headers and what styles to apply to the cell when it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>에 전달 되는 `containingField` 머리글을 표시할지 여부와 렌더링 될 때 셀에 적용할 스타일을 결정 하기 매개 변수를 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"></xref> that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField"> </xref> 현재 셀이 들어 있는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets abbreviated text, which is rendered in an HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_abbr" name="abbr" href=""></xref> attribute and is used by screen readers.
trans-unit.target: Html에서 렌더링 약식된 텍스트를 가져오거나 설정 합니다. <xref uid="langword_csharp_abbr" name="abbr" href=""> </xref> 특성 및 화면 판독기가 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the AbbreviatedText property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 속성은 AbbreviatedText 값 뷰 상태에 저장 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A shortened version of the table header text, which is read by screen readers.
trans-unit.target: 화면 판독기가 읽은 테이블 머리글 텍스트의 약식된 버전입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Adds information about the table cell to the list of attributes to render.
trans-unit.target: 테이블 셀에 대 한 정보를 렌더링할 특성 목록에 추가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method adds the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute> attributes if the respective <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: AddAttributesToRender 메서드 추가 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute>특성이 경우 해당 특성 각각 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A>속성이 설정 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.AbbreviatedText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell.Scope%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterAttribute>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream that renders HTML content to the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> HTML 클라이언트에 콘텐츠를 렌더링 하는 출력 스트림을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header cell's scope within an HTML table.
trans-unit.target: HTML 테이블 내에서 머리글 셀의 범위를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Scope property is rendered as an HTML `scope` attribute by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell> object.
trans-unit.target: Html Scope 속성 값이 렌더링 `scope` 하 여 특성의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell>개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldHeaderCell>

trans-unit.source: Although the Scope property is initialized to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>, you should set it to either <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>, depending on the cells that the header represents.
trans-unit.target: 범위 속성은 초기화 하지만 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>, 중 하나를 설정 해야 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>나타내는 머리글 셀에 따라.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope>

trans-unit.source: The value of the Scope property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 속성은 범위의 값 뷰 상태에 저장 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope"> </xref> 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableHeaderScope"> </xref>합니다.
